document.full_text: ivory coast's alassane ouattara took his presidential oath on friday, cementing his rule over the west african state in a tense ceremony conducted by an ally of ousted leader laurent gbagbo.
document.title: ivory coast's ouattara sworn in at tense ceremony
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's alassane ouattara took his presidential oath on friday, cementing his rule over the west african state in a tense ceremony conducted by an ally of ousted leader laurent gbagbo.
